00047 // specialize std::iterator_traits to avoid problems with the name of
00048 // pointer's constructor shadowing its nested pointer type
00049 // do this before pointer is defined so the specialization is correctly
00050 // used inside the definition
00051 namespace std
00052 {
00053 
00054 template<typename Element>
00055   struct iterator_traits<thrust::system::omp::pointer<Element> >
00056 {
00057   private:
00058     typedef thrust::system::omp::pointer<Element> ptr;
00059 
00060   public:
00061     typedef typename ptr::iterator_category       iterator_category;
00062     typedef typename ptr::value_type              value_type;
00063     typedef typename ptr::difference_type         difference_type;
00064     typedef ptr                                   pointer;
00065     typedef typename ptr::reference               reference;
00066 }; // end iterator_traits
00067 
00068 } // end std
00069

00095 // forward declaration of reference for pointer
00096 template<typename Element> class reference;
00097 
00101 // XXX nvcc + msvc have trouble instantiating reference below
00102 //     this is a workaround
00103 namespace detail
00104 {
00105 
00106 template<typename Element>
00107   struct reference_msvc_workaround
00108 {
00109   typedef thrust::system::omp::reference<Element> type;
00110 }; // end reference_msvc_workaround
00111 
00112 } // end detail

00118 
00124 struct tag { unspecified };

00148 template<typename T>
00149   class pointer
00150     : public thrust::pointer<
00151                T,
00152                thrust::system::omp::tag,
00153                thrust::system::omp::reference<T>,
00154                thrust::system::omp::pointer<T>
00155              >
00156 {
00160   private:
00161     typedef thrust::pointer<
00162       T,
00163       thrust::system::omp::tag,
00164       //thrust::system::omp::reference<T>,
00165       typename detail::reference_msvc_workaround<T>::type,
00166       thrust::system::omp::pointer<T>
00167     > super_t;
00168 
00172   public:
00173     // note that omp::pointer's member functions need __host__ __device__
00174     // to interoperate with nvcc + iterators' dereference member function
00175 
00178     __host__ __device__
00179     pointer() : super_t() {}
00180 
00187     template<typename OtherT>
00188     __host__ __device__
00189     explicit pointer(OtherT *ptr) : super_t(ptr) {}
00190 
00197     template<typename OtherPointer>
00198     __host__ __device__
00199     pointer(const OtherPointer &other,
00200             typename thrust::detail::enable_if_pointer_is_convertible<
00201               OtherPointer,
00202               pointer
00203             >::type * = 0) : super_t(other) {}
00204 
00211     template<typename OtherPointer>
00212     __host__ __device__
00213     typename thrust::detail::enable_if_pointer_is_convertible<
00214       OtherPointer,
00215       pointer,
00216       pointer &
00217     >::type
00218     operator=(const OtherPointer &other)
00219     {
00220       return super_t::operator=(other);
00221     }
00222 }; // end pointer
00223 
00224 
00230 template<typename T>
00231   class reference
00232     : public thrust::reference<
00233                T,
00234                thrust::system::omp::pointer<T>,
00235                thrust::system::omp::reference<T>
00236              >
00237 {
00241   private:
00242     typedef thrust::reference<
00243       T,
00244       thrust::system::omp::pointer<T>,
00245       thrust::system::omp::reference<T>
00246     > super_t;
00247 
00251   public:
00255     typedef typename super_t::value_type value_type;
00256     typedef typename super_t::pointer    pointer;
00257 
00267     __host__ __device__
00268     explicit reference(const pointer &ptr)
00269       : super_t(ptr)
00270     {}
00271 
00281     template<typename OtherT>
00282     __host__ __device__
00283     reference(const reference<OtherT> &other,
00284               typename thrust::detail::enable_if_convertible<
00285                 typename reference<OtherT>::pointer,
00286                 pointer
00287               >::type * = 0)
00288       : super_t(other)
00289     {}
00290 
00297     template<typename OtherT>
00298     reference &operator=(const reference<OtherT> &other);
00299 
00305     reference &operator=(const value_type &x);
00306 }; // end reference

00313 __host__ __device__
00314 void swap(reference<T> x, reference<T> y);

00326 inline pointer<void> malloc(std::size_t n);

00334 inline void free(pointer<void> ptr);

00336 // XXX upon c++11
00337 // template<typename T> using allocator = thrust::detail::malloc_allocator<T,tag,pointer<T> >;
00338 
00343 template<typename T>
00344   struct allocator
00345     : thrust::detail::malloc_allocator<
00346         T,
00347         tag,
00348         pointer<T>
00349       >
00350 {
00356   template<typename U>
00357     struct rebind
00358   {
00361     typedef allocator<U> other;
00362   };
00363 
00366   __host__ __device__
00367   inline allocator() {}
00368 
00371   __host__ __device__
00372   inline allocator(const allocator &) {}
00373 
00376   template<typename U>
00377   __host__ __device__
00378   inline allocator(const allocator<U> &) {}
00379 
00382   __host__ __device__
00383   inline ~allocator() {}
00384 }; // end allocator
